body: This is actually because `_raw_resize_sparse_legacy` (this function) is called from `sparse_raw_resize_legacy_`, which is defined in `native_functions.yaml` and can't be gated behind the `USE_TH_SIZE_ZERO_DIM` flag.
body_html: This is actually because _raw_resize_sparse_legacy (this function) is called from sparse_raw_resize_legacy_, which is defined in native_functions.yaml and can't be gated behind the USE_TH_SIZE_ZERO_DIM flag.
body_text: This is actually because _raw_resize_sparse_legacy (this function) is called from sparse_raw_resize_legacy_, which is defined in native_functions.yaml and can't be gated behind the USE_TH_SIZE_ZERO_DIM flag.
